trans-unit.source: Datasets
trans-unit.target: Datasets

trans-unit.source: Datasets
trans-unit.target: Datasets

trans-unit.source: This topic and its sub-topics provides the JSON format that is supported by the older versions of Azure PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: This topic and its sub-topics provides the JSON format that is supported by the older versions of Azure PowerShell.

trans-unit.source: If you are using the July 2015 Release version of Azure PowerShell or later, see <link xlink:href="271962fb-81a8-4008-8b46-a6f497457078" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Datasets</link> for the latest JSON format.
trans-unit.target: If you are using the July 2015 Release version of Azure PowerShell or later, see <link xlink:href="271962fb-81a8-4008-8b46-a6f497457078" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Datasets</link> for the latest JSON format.

trans-unit.source: You can convert the JSON from old format to new format by using the tool: <externalLink><linkText>JSON Upgrade Tool</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=618507</linkUri></externalLink>
trans-unit.target: You can convert the JSON from old format to new format by using the tool: <externalLink><linkText>JSON Upgrade Tool</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=618507</linkUri></externalLink>

trans-unit.source: A <embeddedLabel>dataset</embeddedLabel> is a named view of data.
trans-unit.target: A <embeddedLabel>dataset</embeddedLabel> is a named view of data.

trans-unit.source: The data being described can vary from simple bytes, semi-structured data like CSV files all the way up to relational tables or even models.
trans-unit.target: The data being described can vary from simple bytes, semi-structured data like CSV files all the way up to relational tables or even models.

trans-unit.source: A Data Factory <embeddedLabel>table</embeddedLabel> is a data set that has a schema and is rectangular.
trans-unit.target: A Data Factory <embeddedLabel>table</embeddedLabel> is a data set that has a schema and is rectangular.

trans-unit.source: The top-level structure for the Table JSON is as follows:
trans-unit.target: The top-level structure for the Table JSON is as follows:

trans-unit.source: The following table describes top-level properties in the JSON script for a table.
trans-unit.target: The following table describes top-level properties in the JSON script for a table.

trans-unit.source: Tag
trans-unit.target: Tag

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Required
trans-unit.target: Required

trans-unit.source: Name
trans-unit.target: Name

trans-unit.source: Name of the table.
trans-unit.target: Name of the table.

trans-unit.source: Yes
trans-unit.target: Yes

trans-unit.source: structure
trans-unit.target: structure

trans-unit.source: Contains an array of columns (Name and Type).
trans-unit.target: Contains an array of columns (Name and Type).

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="88797541-641b-4d12-986f-90b45cb03a81" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Structure Element</link> topic for details.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="88797541-641b-4d12-986f-90b45cb03a81" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Structure Element</link> topic for details.

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: No

trans-unit.source: The structure section is only required when using column mapping It is optional in other cases.
trans-unit.target: The structure section is only required when using column mapping It is optional in other cases.

trans-unit.source: location
trans-unit.target: location

trans-unit.source: Defines the format of the data and where to find the data.
trans-unit.target: Defines the format of the data and where to find the data.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="5606aefb-b5d3-49f0-b108-2ab3d0652e77" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Location Element</link> topic for the types of tables supported and their location properties.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="5606aefb-b5d3-49f0-b108-2ab3d0652e77" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Location Element</link> topic for the types of tables supported and their location properties.

trans-unit.source: Yes
trans-unit.target: Yes

trans-unit.source: Availability
trans-unit.target: Availability

trans-unit.source: Defines the cadence (hourly, daily, weekly, etc…)
trans-unit.target: Defines the cadence (hourly, daily, weekly, etc…)

trans-unit.source: in which a slice of the table is produced.
trans-unit.target: in which a slice of the table is produced.

trans-unit.source: If the data is produced outside of the data factory, you should use waitOnExternal property and specify the duration for waiting for the external data to be available.
trans-unit.target: If the data is produced outside of the data factory, you should use waitOnExternal property and specify the duration for waiting for the external data to be available.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="8a4ae877-72ef-4244-bb4d-cd59cee8fa39" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Availability Element</link> topic for more details.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="8a4ae877-72ef-4244-bb4d-cd59cee8fa39" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Availability Element</link> topic for more details.

trans-unit.source: Yes
trans-unit.target: Yes

trans-unit.source: Policy
trans-unit.target: Policy

trans-unit.source: Specifies the policies for each run of the pipelines that produces the table.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the policies for each run of the pipelines that produces the table.

trans-unit.source: See the <link xlink:href="6181047b-27fe-4cdb-b7f5-7ba2fe4443f7" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Policy Element</link> topic for details.
trans-unit.target: See the <link xlink:href="6181047b-27fe-4cdb-b7f5-7ba2fe4443f7" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Policy Element</link> topic for details.

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: No

trans-unit.source: In This Section
trans-unit.target: In This Section
